wifindus

Class EventObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • wifindus.EventObject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The event listener interface type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Device, Incident

    public abstract class EventObject<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic parent object for event listener management.
    Author:
    Mark 'marzer' Gillard

      Constructor and Description
      EventObject()
      Constructs a new EventObject.
      EventObject(T... listeners)
      Constructs a new EventObject.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEventListener(T listener)
      Adds a new event listener.
      void clearEventListeners()
      Unscribes all event listeners from this object's state events.
      protected void fireEvent(java.lang.String event, java.lang.Object... data)
      Fires an internal event, calling the appropriate listener functions on all subcribed listener objects.
      protected abstract void mapEvents(java.lang.String event, T listener, java.lang.Object... data)
      Maps event keys to recipient functions on listener objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventObject

        @SafeVarargs
public EventObject(T... listeners)
        Constructs a new EventObject.
        Parameters:
        listeners - A variable-length list of event listeners that will watch this object's state.

      • EventObject

        public EventObject()
        Constructs a new EventObject.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventListener

        public final void addEventListener(T listener)
        Adds a new event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - subscribes an event listener to this object's state events.

      • removeEventListener

        public final void removeEventListener(T listener)
        Removes an existing event listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - unsubscribes an event listener from this object's state events. Has no effect if this parameter is null, or is not currently subscribed to this object.

      • clearEventListeners

        public final void clearEventListeners()
        Unscribes all event listeners from this object's state events.

      • fireEvent

        protected final void fireEvent(java.lang.String event,
             java.lang.Object... data)
        Fires an internal event, calling the appropriate listener functions on all subcribed listener objects.
        Parameters:
        event - The key representing the recipient event. Case-insensitive; will be converted to lowercase.
        data - Optional variable-length list of data to pass to recipient functions via mapEvents(java.lang.String, T, java.lang.Object...).

      • mapEvents

        protected abstract void mapEvents(java.lang.String event,
             T listener,
             java.lang.Object... data)
        Maps event keys to recipient functions on listener objects.
        Parameters:
        event - The key of the event to map. Will always be in lowercase, regardless of how it was called.
        listener - The listener object to fire the events on.
        data - Variable-length list of data passed from the initial call to fireEvent(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...).
